News 
»

Try Our Zero Proof Libations for Dry January
Dry January | All Locations 
ALWAYS AVAILABLE

PALOMA PURA

agave, lime, grapefruit soda

BERRY SPARKLER

blueberry, house hibiscus lemonade, bubbles

CIDER FIZZ

spiced apple cider, lemon, cranberry, ginger ale

DRY JANUARY FEATURES

HIYO SELTZER

social tonic with a feel-good “float” effectchoose peach mango, blackberry lemon, watermelon lime, or strawberry guava

FAUX-MOSA

fre alcohol removed sparkling brut, choose orange or pomegranate

FRE

Alcohol Removed Sparkling Brut | Californiagreen apple & pear aromas, plus crisp flavors of apple & strawberry

ATHLETIC | NON-ALCOHOLIC

rotating selection | 0% abv
Locations may have additional non-alcoholic beverages available – please ask your server for details. TRY DRY Previous Next Next

Cater Your Next Event
All News 
»
News

Cater Your Next Event
Burtons Grill Catering | Available Now 
Just like in our restaurants, every dish on our Catering Menu is prepared from scratch with wholesome, premium ingredients. You’ll find many of our classic recipes, as well as new favorites perfect for your upcoming party & next corporate meeting, family celebration, or large-scale event. As always, we accommodate food allergies and gluten-free needs so everyone can enjoy. Together tastes better!

For inquiries & personalized service, please contact us at .
catering@burtonsgrill.com VIEW MENU ORDER NOW Previous Next Next

Chicken 8

18

allen brothers angus beef, lettuce, tomato,

Steaks

our steaks are premium angus beef from allen brothers of chicago, hand-selected & grilled over an open flame.

Filet Mignon*

49

8oz center cut filet, bone marrow butter,
seasonal vegetable, garlic mashed potatoes

NY Strip*

44

seasonal vegetable, garlic mashed potatoes

Ribeye*

49

seasonal vegetable, garlic mashed potatoes

34

chimichurri, parmesan truffle fries

panko-crusted chicken, rotini, english peas,

Fresh Seafood

we are passionate about fresh, premium & sustainable seafood sourced locally whenever possible.

Lobster Roll

35

brioche bun, french fries, coleslaw
choose warm & buttered or chilled with lettuce, aioli

Ahi Tuna Bowl*

28

togarashi-crusted tuna, avocado, carrots,
cilantro cucumber salad, pickled red onions,
sushi rice, sesame seeds, ginger & soy aioli

Cajun Shrimp Pasta

26

pan-seared shrimp, bacon, rotini, artichoke hearts,
english peas, cayenne parmesan cream sauce

39.5

jumbo lump blue crab, whole-grain mustard
beurre blanc, coleslaw, french fries

32

bronzed salmon, fennel slaw, romesco sauce,

Before placing your order, please inform your server if a person in your party has a food allergy. We take the responsibility of safely serving our guests with food allergies and dietary restrictions very seriously, and we’re proud of our extensive protocols. Ask us about them! *This menu item may be served raw or undercooked. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase the risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions.

Wine Wednesdays
Wine Wednesdays | Select Locations*

Join Us for Brunch
Weekend Brunch | Now Available

A delicious menu awaits you every weekend at Burtons Grill! There’s something delightful for everyone to enjoy, so gather your friends & treat yourself this weekend.

Join Us for Happy Hour – CT, FL, MD, NH, PA, SC, VA
Happy Hour | Select Locations 
Monday-Friday from 3:00PM-6:00PM | FL (Plantation), PA (Wayne), VA (Richmond)Monday-Friday from 3:00PM-7:00PM | MD & VA (Alexandria, Charlottesville & Sterling)Monday-Friday from 3:30PM-6:30PM | CT, FL (Boca Raton), NH (Nashua)Monday-Friday from 4:00PM-6:00PM | SC (Mount Pleasant)

Don’t wait for the weekend – kick back & unwind sooner with a beverage from our new Happy Hour menu. Enjoy deals on select cocktails, beers & wines paired with elevated bar bites every weekday at the bar.*
Select Your Location to View the Menu CT – South Windsor FL – Boca Raton FL – Plantation MD – Gaithersburg MD – Riverdale Park NH – Nashua PA – Wayne SC – Mount Pleasant VA – Alexandria VA – Charlottesville VA – Richmond VA – Sterling Bang Bang Broccoli Nashville Hot Chicken Slider Chips & Guac Crab Cake Slider 
*Happy Hour menu available only while seated in designated areas. Draft beer is not available at our South Windsor, CT location.
Click here to view our Bar Bites Menu (available in GA, NC & Lynnfield, MA). Previous Next Next

Team

General Manager:

Emily Kearley

Our restaurant in Mount Pleasant, SC is located in Mount Pleasant Towne Centre, just a few miles east of Charleston. This location is the best place to enjoy weekend brunch, Wine Wednesday, Happy Hour, seasonal outdoor dining & more in Mount Pleasant. Join us for a delicious meal in our comfortable dining room, order takeout or delivery to enjoy at home, or let us cater your next meeting or event.

The Burtons Grill Mount Pleasant menu features juicy burgers, bountiful salads, tender steaks, fresh seafood & more. Our food is always made from scratch with wholesome, premium ingredients – including gluten free & allergy friendly options.
